website_summaries.verdict: A good source of omega-3s for a good price — keep in mind that some say there an aftertaste with these, though.
pros: One bottle will last at least 2 months and give you 600 mg of omega-3 fatty acids
The fish oil is sourced from wild-caught fish, so you're still getting quality even at a cheaper price
cons: Although they're marketed as "burpless," several buyers say there is some aftertaste
The softgels can stick together in the bottle

customer_reviews.title: Bootleg product, do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bootleg product, do not buy!! I buy this product often, shrink wrap doesn't say nature made, bottle is almost see through, label is either lacking ink or sun damaged, pills are hard plastic and won't cut or melt in hot water overnight, no cotton or oxygen absorber that are usually in the package
customer_reviews.author: BreezyNick

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with dry skin?
customer_reviews.text: I'm always worried about taking fish oil supplements because I worry about scaring everyone away with fishy burps. I have been taking two of these supplements daily in the morning for the past 3 months without any problems or fishy reguigitation. Admittedly, I haven't seen the amazing benefits of this supplement either but as a medical professional, I recognize that the effects are subtle and long-term. HOWEVER, I have been giving this to my dog for the past 3 months and one fascinating thing I noticed is that his dandruff has dramatically improved. There are a lot less white flakey dead skin on his black fur! I'm am very happy to see that effect so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Helps with dog's ear infections!
customer_reviews.text: My little English Bulldog is prone to ear infections and our vet wanted to put her on $90/30lb bag of Royal Canine food because it is full of Omega-3. We opted out and thought we would just give her fish oil instead. She gets 2 pills everyday and has been doing really well on keeping the infections at bay. Please make sure when you take this that you read the amount of actual Omega-3 per pill. This bottle has 300mg of Omega-3 per 1000mg pill. Dose accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: No aftertaste or burping
customer_reviews.text: I have a rather sensitive stomach and also don't like fish. I have been taking these for a few weeks and there is NO aftertaste or burping whatsoever. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Dr. ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Just what the Dr. ordered. Literally. Due to massive problems with statins, the Dr. put me on a mix of high dose niacin, fish oil and Co Q10. The Nature Made are the least offensive of the bunch I can find. No fishy taste / burp. And my numbers are back where they should be!
customer_reviews.author: David Hostetler

customer_reviews.title: The softgels in this container are much larger than shown in the photo next to a penny.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this container of Nature Made fish oil softgels because the photo in the description showed the softgels to be smaller and shorter than a penny. The actual softgels are larger and longer than a penny. I'd like to find a smaller softgel because the large ones are difficult to swallow. Can you suggest one of the advertised softgel brands that is smaller than the standard size?
customer_reviews.author: Diana severns

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I had taken these fish oil pills before on and off for the health effects. After I had LASIK surgery, I took them daily. I try never to miss a dose because it really helps with my dry eye. It really makes a difference to my eyes. The dry eye is not gone but it is better. These pills, combines with systane drops gives great relief. The pills are very big though. So, if you have trouble swallowing you should not get these pills. The pills are at a great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan Alexandros

customer_reviews.title: Great, the effects of this take a while to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great, the effects of this take a while to be noticeable. It's not like a "kick" or immediate sensation just an overall better feeling and more resilient cognition over time. Have been taking for a year or so now.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G.

customer_reviews.title: Rancid smell when opened on delivery
customer_reviews.text: Rancid fish smell when I opened the bottle!! Enough to make you sick. I would expect better from Nature Made. Maybe this bottle was stored somewhere too hot or something before it was shipped to me? Absolutely disgusting. I closed bottle and threw out. Waste of money. Do not buy. I was trying to avoid going to the pharmacy or store for these due to Covid. But I think I’d be better off buying them in the store where they are likely fresher.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica1735

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Solid fish oil pill, no more burping and cannot taste it. Health benefits is what you believe it will do and how much you take it. If taking at least 3-5 times a week or more, there has been studies to show. If your taking it only 1-2 days a week then it might be less to no effect. Some is better than none though in my opinion. My Doctor recommends fish/omega oil pills, and other than a solid multi vitamin thats the only other supplement she stands behind, so there has to be something to fish oil
customer_reviews.author: Chuck L

customer_reviews.title: Eventually, you'll need fish oil...
customer_reviews.text: As we age, almost all your doctors will say fish oil is the answer to dry eyes, dry mouth, dry everything. I couldn't handle the typical fish oil supplements, however, this burpless kind was much better. I still make sure to eat something AFTER taking it, though. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. Iovino

customer_reviews.title: NOT burbless, not small but at least its USP verified
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brand because it is one of the ONLY BRANDS on the market that is verified by the USP for quality and authenticity as compared to most brands which do not submit their products to independent lab testing so they could just as easily sell you a pill made of rice instead of the real thing and the FDA can do nothing about it. So that part if great. On the other hand, this pill is one of the larger pills I've ever had to swallow and I definitely have unpleasant fishy burps afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Stu P Talene

customer_reviews.title: Less aching.  Less moodiness.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I waited to write the review until I really tested them out. Easy to swallow. Better sleep less pain. Now More relaxed. Better than the drug store brand. Perfect addition to my collection of arthritis meds. I ordered 2 more after I fell in love to make sure I always have available for aichs and paid. Improved mood. Better than gnc. Great value for the money. Would order again. Fast shipping and they work amazing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: dawn shippy

customer_reviews.text: These capsules are big but neither me or my husband have any trouble swallowing them. What's really great is they don't have a fishy smell! I don't like fish, and hate the smell so these are great. I'd also say these are definitely burpless as they say. We've never had an issue with that. I've been using these for over a couple months now. I'm not sure if I've noticed any difference in myself yet though, could take some more time to have a full effect. I will repurchase though and I do recommend these if you're looking for a fish oil supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Krijishy

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin miracle
customer_reviews.text: Best fish oil! No taste and so many great benefits! I live in the desert and everyone's skin is dry and cracked during the winter months, except mine! Because I religiously take these vitamins!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B.

customer_reviews.title: Good but nothing exceptional compared to other brands I've used.
customer_reviews.text: These probably are helpful and don't cause any fish burps or any other noticeable side effects. I am a bit concerned about the cloudy color, although I have no information to suggest that matters. I think this product is good, but not substantially better than a number of other brands I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: ElbeauTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: No fish burps but are large
customer_reviews.text: I have tried taking fish capsules many times but can’t stand fishy belches. These capsules have a very thick coating and I haven’t had an issue with them. Now I can reap the benefits of fish oil. They are large so that might be an issue for some people.
customer_reviews.author: RSD

customer_reviews.title: NOT burpless
customer_reviews.text: This product is not burpless - at least not for me. I have switched brands and found one I can tolerate much better. Many Nature Made products work well for me, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: curlyonline

customer_reviews.title: No burps, very good product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this Nature Made fish oil for years. I've never experienced any after-taste or burping, even from the regular Nature Made fish oil. I'm sold on this product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane D. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's really working out well for me last doctor visit was great! Reduced the number of different medications I was taking that's a major star on the plus side!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Pay more for quality with Nordic or Dr. Tobias etc. Any other brand really
customer_reviews.text: These are garbage. There's no knowing how much EPA and DHA is present.
customer_reviews.author: UvaroviteKing

customer_reviews.title: Almost too big to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I have been using fish oil tablets for a number of years. The problem I had is with swallowing the large pill. When I saw the pic of the pill next to penny it appeared smaller. Not sure where they got the penny - even allowing for inflation the pill is bigger than in pic.
customer_reviews.author: Bjr

customer_reviews.title: No fishy burps
customer_reviews.text: These are what I wanted. The other ones I got at the store made me burp bad and it was gross. These don't cause a fishy taste.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Horse pills
customer_reviews.text: False advertisement. The photo sowing the pill tp be smaller than a penny is fake. The pill is as large as many others
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fish oil capsules aren’t supposed to be hard...
customer_reviews.text: These are not like they should be.... hard & crack when you slightly squeeze them... almost like it’s a bad batch or old but expiration date is 2020! Will not buy again 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Beth Westlund

customer_reviews.title: Not fish tasteless for me
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say that these are the best fish oil pills. Strangely, I find that these make me nauseous. I have minor nauseated coughing fits and I taste the fish oil 100%
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Really is burpless!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! I bought to take during pregnancy because I had heard it would help ease morningsickness. My morningsickness has vanished! I'm not sure if it would work for everyone, but it's definitely worth a try if you're expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Really Are "Burpless"
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous since I'd been having trouble with morning sickness and had some pills that were definitely not "burpless" (burping chili and fish oil simultaneously would probably make anyone gag, though, right). But these were great and I did not burp any nasty fish at all after taking them!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: They added tocopherols.
customer_reviews.text: These now have tocopherols, which are "all the rage" right now. Some tocopherols give me a headache. So far, these are okay. (Fish oil has really helped with my energy and stamina in the afternoons.)
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Jen-Jen

customer_reviews.title: No Aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: These truly are "Burp-less"!!! I am still on my first bottle and there is a notable difference in my skin and hair, not to mention all the good it's doing for my heart.
customer_reviews.author: Bubblz

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dry Eyes-No fishy taste
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these really are burpless. No fishy taste at all. My eye doctor recommended fish oil for my dry eyes so I ordered these. As it turns out, they ended up helping with stiffness in my knees also. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Tippins

customer_reviews.title: So much better!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than the first non-burpless ones I tried. I’ve been taking these every day for about three weeks now and not a single fish burp! I do only take one pill a day (suggested serving is two), but even with two I doubt fish burps would be an issue 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something's fishy here
customer_reviews.text: I ignored the reviews that said these pills felt like they had a thick plastic coating. But I couldn't have been more wrong. I was too scared to take even one pill. Will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Dog Health
customer_reviews.text: My dog has one of these daily to assist with mange management. I just put it in with his kibble, whole pill, and he chomps it down with the rest of it.
customer_reviews.author: Brieanne Lacaillade

customer_reviews.title: Not Burpless But Is A Fish Oil Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I usually get my supplements from and Vitamins from Costco, but was lazy, so I ordered these on line. I will go back to Costco because of the savings and quality. These aren’t bad at all though
customer_reviews.author: Essence56

customer_reviews.title: Burpless!
customer_reviews.text: All fish oil pills should be burpless. I bought some regular capsules not too long ago, and I was burping all day. Burpless is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: ghvz1

customer_reviews.title: It worths every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as recommended by my physician to increase my immunity and reducing the triglyceride and it worked although it is hard to swallow at first.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Hutabarat

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Although large pills, these are a nice way to get a dose of good fats. As advertised, they do not make me burp and have no real fishy taste.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Newcomer

customer_reviews.title: No more fish burps
customer_reviews.text: The benefits of fish in a pill form. These are great. If you’re familiar with fish oil then you know that taste and smell when you burp. Not a problem with these. I will continue purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Shane McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: No Fish Oil Burps Yet
customer_reviews.text: I always have an issue with disgusting burps when I take fish oil and I have taken quite a few of these and have yet to experience a problem. The pills also have a high quality feel to them. I will purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: SLH

customer_reviews.title: Fish Oil
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product the pills were to large and they made me sick to the stomach everytime I took them.
customer_reviews.author: Verdell V. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: no burps and easier to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed any difference between the quality of the fish oil in this product versus my previous brand. But there are no fish burps with these and the smaller capsule size is easier to swallow. definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the picture!
customer_reviews.text: These are 3 times the size of the capsules shown in the picture next to the penny! The doctor prescribed these for my 9 year old, so that’s the only reason I ordered this particular one. I could’ve gone to any store in town and gotten the giant ones that I was sent.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Lane

customer_reviews.title: Not fishy
customer_reviews.text: I have no clue how it effects my cholesterol or health. But I take it daily and never tastes fishy and never makes me burp. Huge capsules but not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gorton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome🐦
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Sauce. Just like I Hoped it would. Very Very Happy. Tanks a Bunch. 💞💞👍👍🐦🐦
customer_reviews.author: Scott Snyder

customer_reviews.title: AS GOOD AS ANY
customer_reviews.text: As we know - it depends on what you like. I found these to be more than adequate. They’re also something you can get at any health store!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Myers

customer_reviews.title: All pills were lumped together
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve purchased this product where all the pills were stuck together. The first time they came apart easily by shaking the bottle but this time they were so stuck together I could not get them apart b
customer_reviews.author: joe revis

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but not organic, many added ingredients
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of extra added ingredients to this. I would prefer not to have all the additives, and next time I'll just order regular food oil to avoid the extra weird stuff.
customer_reviews.author: F0xgl0ves

customer_reviews.title: Good price for quantity
customer_reviews.text: No fishy breath after you take the capsules. Good price for quantity.
customer_reviews.author: H.H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price ...
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time, good presentation and is easy to swallow. Excellent quality and price ...
customer_reviews.author: RICARDO THEVENIN

customer_reviews.title: Better than cheap fish oil.
customer_reviews.text: Still causes mild burps as any fish oil does but doesn’t have the fishy taste or odor. I’d consider that a win. Definitely better than cheap fish oil.
customer_reviews.author: Rylan

customer_reviews.title: Size is larger than what is shown
customer_reviews.text: Just so you know, the picture shown here shows it smaller than a penny. That is not accurate. It is the size of a quarter. The image is very misleading and is not easy for me to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s not fish oil not there wouldn’t be any fish smell or flavor in it , jut brows for other one if u read my comment.
customer_reviews.author: Tamim Khan Sahib

customer_reviews.title: Not Burpless
customer_reviews.text: I actually burped more with this brand than a non-burpless brand I purchased before, although the taste wasn't as unpleasant as the previous brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Senger

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I must have missed read the label it’s fish oil for human consumption not for Fishies LOL
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: No oily burps!
customer_reviews.text: Having to take fish oil stinks, but if you have to, this stuff is great. No oily burps at all, even with no food.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend anyone wanting burpless fish oil, that this is true to its word.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that this fish oil is truly burpless. I could not take Omegs Xl, because it caused way to much gas. This band is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: These are "Burpless as advertised".
customer_reviews.text: These softgels are large but pretty easy to swallow. And I took them for a month and they are burpless.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jenson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Best fish oil pills I have ever purchased. No after taste. Easy to swallow. No burping taste. Affordable. Arrivived on time. I plan on reordering these again when I get close to running out. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: TrueReview

customer_reviews.title: I don't smell like a catfish
customer_reviews.text: These seem to do the trick without having the nasty fish burps. I did actually see my good Cholestrol level go up after regularly using these.
customer_reviews.author: gcolvard

customer_reviews.title: Small nice
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than others I have gotten fit in patients Med tray nicely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my mother, but they were very ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mother, but they were very difficult for her to swallow. She’s still trying to make them work, but it would have been helpful to have a picture of the actual size.
customer_reviews.author: Art Lady Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a better fish oil pill because all of the ones I have taken have just disgusted me. While these still smell pretty awful ( all of the do ) it has now made me sick or left a gross taste in my mouth, and no burping! They are easy to take. I have no complaints and definitely recommend them to others!
customer_reviews.author: Heather and Ryne Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Try a different brand
customer_reviews.text: Very large, hard to swallow and this product is not a burpless.
customer_reviews.author: D. Muro

customer_reviews.title: Burpless
customer_reviews.text: The first fish oil that truly is burpless. Just bought a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: skbs

customer_reviews.title: Great product and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and does the job. I use this as part of my daily supplement. I don’t get the after effects of burping so that was really my only concern. It helps with mental clarity but also getting the omega 3 fatty acids I need.
customer_reviews.author: GORDON D.

customer_reviews.title: Truly burpless
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding and really are burpless. No fishy aftertaste!
customer_reviews.author: partyartie

customer_reviews.title: Good for human or our pets
customer_reviews.text: Good for my needs ( not big sea food eater) and my dog for heath wellness
customer_reviews.author: Fabian G

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking fish oil for over 10 years. I have tried many other brands and always come back to this brand. It has made a difference on my blood test and that is what counts. I take 6 of these a day.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Flamingo

customer_reviews.title: Worthy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm into the cold pressed omega's now but I still think the stuff works! Great for the mind!
customer_reviews.author: Justin McLain

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you think it is.
customer_reviews.text: It is fish oil, it lubs up the joints. It helps with my joint pain in the gym. It works just fine, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Trace C.

customer_reviews.title: What’s pictured is not what’s shipped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the fish oil that showed the size of the pill was smaller than a penny so my daughter could swallow them. What arrived was the large oblong pills that she cannot swallow. Representation on the product was not what was delivered. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Burp these things like crazy - hate the fish taste Threw them in the trash
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Very mild if any fish taste works take daily does make my skin oily. This is good for inflammation. Big capsules So make sure u can swallow them.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get out of bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I received them all stuck together and can't pry them apart. I put them in the refrigerator to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Patterson

customer_reviews.title: A Difficult supplement purchase..
customer_reviews.text: There are soo many things that effect each batch/company of making a quality Omega-3 fish oil.. The reality is: DUE TO THE HORRID WAY GREEDY JERKS HAVE TREATED OUR PLANET & OCEANS FOR MONEY, IT'S ALL A CRAPSHOOT NOW!..
customer_reviews.author: Sir Vertual

customer_reviews.title: Fish Oil Is The Answer
customer_reviews.text: When you can’t take anti inflammatories Fish Oil is the answer. It helps to keep the swelling and pain from the swelling down.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product numerous times to make sure it wasn’t something else causing the side effects and I absolutely hate it! Every time I take it I have the worst burps and upset stomach. I’ve tried it just alone with a full stomach and still the same results. If I could I would give this review no stars!
customer_reviews.author: Omar M.

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: 5 different people used this and all had bad burps and all had upset stomach from this product.

customer_reviews.title: Burpless fish oil
customer_reviews.text: It's totally burpless. I was very skeptical about it being burpless but it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: sle

customer_reviews.title: Nature Made Burp-less Fish Oil
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. One of several supplements I take for overall good health. Softgels easy to swallow despite their size. Never have a problem with fishy aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: No burps as advertised
customer_reviews.text: No burps or fishy aftertaste as advertised, reasonably priced, fast shipment... will reorder
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! This brand doesn't leave me smelling fishy which is always a plus. can tell the difference in my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Burpless!
customer_reviews.text: Not too big. Easy to swallow & best thing.. no burping up the taste of fish..

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for skin.
customer_reviews.text: I got good, soft, clear, and moisturized skin from taking it. Vitamin A really did it for me too. One review said to refrigerate it. I did that with this last bottle and I didn't get the fish stick burps. I recommend taking it at the beginning of the meal to suppress any taste as well. Oh and I found it interesting how oily my scalp was after sweating.
customer_reviews.author: John Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Surprised I had no problem swallowing these!
customer_reviews.text: Huge pills but I had no trouble swallowing them following the directions to take a sip of water first and take the pill with more water. I was very surprised that I could get them down so easily. Also, they are truly burp-free, but have a bit of a smell to them.
customer_reviews.author: Aline R Morris

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: True to it's word no burping of any kind. I am very satisfied with this product, in fact this is the 2nd time I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received very quickly and have used it for years. I believe it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: John Price

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I take one a day. I've read it helps reduce risk for heart disease, Alzheimer's, etc... can't attest to that yet tho.

customer_reviews.title: I take the fish oil and it makes you feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I take the fish oil and it makes you feel stronger and I also give it to my German Shepherp and it helps his coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old
customer_reviews.text: Seems old. Not liquid inside. Pills stick together, have to break each apart.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs too
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these for my dogs I poke a whole in them and squirt in their food they love it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used the product for sometime and very pleased with it. Will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: G.J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Still a little fishy
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. These did kind of give me fish oil burps. Also, my skin went nuts (I broke out) when I was taking the recommended dosage so I had to stop. If anyone has had this same problem and has any advice for me I would appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: W M

customer_reviews.title: Would choke a horse
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these capsules contain just what they say and do what they're supposed to but I will never know because they are way too huge for me to swallow. I gave them away. I wish that descriptions of tablets and capsules would include the size. Even better would be a picture.
customer_reviews.author: BuyBoo

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a fishy smell at all
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years. It's only had a fishy smell once. But, the last bottle I purchased, was fine. No fishy smell or odor at all like the previous time I purchased and I'd never had one smell before that. I recommend this product !!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and properly sealed
customer_reviews.text: Good product ! Sealed and has a sell by of April 2020. Will purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Too large to swallow
customer_reviews.text: These capsules are HUGE. After swallowing one, I felt like there was something caught in my throat for the rest of the day. After a week, I decided to throw the rest of the bottle away.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie K.

customer_reviews.title: Product works
customer_reviews.text: Apparently using the word that is in the product title and sets this product apart from other fish oils gets your review flagged by Amazons sensitivity filter. Anyways, never had any fishy reminders that I took these
customer_reviews.author: BobtheBuck

customer_reviews.title: Other fish oil has given me awful burps and aftertaste ...
customer_reviews.text: Other fish oil has given me awful burps and aftertaste. Been using these for 3 months and haven’t had any issues whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb Wachala

product_meta.title: Nature Made Burp-Less Fish Oil 1000 mg Softgels, 150 Count for Heart Health† (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Size:150 Count (Pack of 1)Trust your heart health with Nature Made Fish Oil, purified to remove mercury.†▲ Every 2 softgels provide 600 mg of heart-healthy omega-3 (500 mg EPA/DHA).† The omega-3 (EPA and DHA) in fish oil help support a healthy heart. Nature Made Fish Oil supply comes from wild caught ocean fish, not farm raised fish.

BRAND STORY
By Nature Made
feature_bullets: For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. Both have the same great product inside. Based on new FDA regulations, you may also notice a change in the unit of measure and/or daily value for certain products.
Contains a 75-day supply of Nature Made Burp-Less Fish Oil, 1000 mg softgels, 150 softgels per bottle.
Every 2 softgels provide 600 mg of heart-healthy omega-3 (500 mg EPA/DHA). Adults, take 2 softgels daily with water and a meal.

Guaranteed to meet our high quality standards. Made from carefully selected ingredients under strict manufacturing processes. Purified to remove mercury.▲ No color added, no artificial flavors, gluten free.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
